events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The shipping is significantly delayed and I haven’t received any updates on the tracking status.
The case has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's report of a late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
Support agent John has been assigned to investigate and resolve the customer's delivery delay issue.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I want to help get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can look into the shipping status for you?
Sure, my order number is #A12345, and the tracking number given was XYZ987654321, but there hasn’t been any update in over a week.
I have contacted the courier service and expedited the shipment for you. You should receive an updated tracking status within 24 hours and delivery within the next three days.
Thank you for the quick response and for expediting my delivery. I appreciate the update and look forward to receiving my order soon.
We consider this issue resolved as the shipping has been expedited and the customer has been informed about the delivery timeline.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your order. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received my order yesterday and everything is in perfect condition. Thank you again for your assistance!
We are closing this case as the delivery issue has been resolved and the customer has confirmed receipt of the order.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience regarding the delivery delay.
